Desc.eng: I curse you Koschei! I served faithfully, yet you shackled my soul to this tomb. I curse you for denying my revenge beyond the grave!
I remember him. He was a nobleman who conspired to butcher a rival family, but was caught. His execution lasted for weeks.
We bear the same grudge against the Faceless Tsar, mortal. I could be a powerful ally, if you lift my curse! Together we can destroy the remnants of House Lavinius!
Butchering a whole family? Sounds like an unfair deal for a mad ghost.
That family is long dead, Van Helsing.
An ally could always come handy, vengeful ghost or not.
I think I'll lift this curse by destroying you.
You deserve to suffer eternally. Goodbye.
